about_the_game:
This Is An Escapade That Begins In the Fridge ...

▼Game Features

When the main character, a young girl, wakes up, she is in a refrigerator. When she opens the door and peeks outside, she sees a human being simmering in a pot and a monster staring at her with its tongue hanging out.... Sensing danger, the girl tries to escape from the house without being discovered by the monsters.

▼Jack the Doll's Vision!

The main character, a young girl, has a special ability that allows her to jack the doll's vision and see what is going on around her. She can check on the monsters while hiding in a safe place, such as inside a closet.

▼Find the Keys!

To escape from the house of monsters, you must find as many keys as you need. The locations where the keys are hidden are randomly placed during each game play. Search all over the house while hiding from the monsters.

▼ If the monsters catch her, they carefully cook her...

If captured by monsters, a helpless girl has no way to resist. They will carefully cook her and eat her up...

▼ Four Stages and Different Endings

There are four stages in total, and each stage changes the size of the map, the placement of enemies, and their behavior patterns. There are also four different endings for each stage.

▼ Playing Time

About 1 to 2 Hours.

▼ About Video Distribution

・Distribution is available to both individuals and corporations without permission.

・Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.

・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or live broadcast, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.

We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.

The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.
